title: Mwe bantu bonse ba panshi
subtitle: all people that on earth do dwell
author: unknown

title: Twamulumbanya mwe lesa
author: unknown
verses: Mwe lesa tata pe na pe;

title: Wa mushilo wine, lesa wa maka
author: unknown
verses: Wa mushilo wine, lesa wa maka,
Wa mushilo wine, wa luse, wa maka,
Bonse ba mu mulu bawa, baletila,
Wa mushilo ni mwe; mwabafye kateka
Wa cine cine, no wa bulamba.
Wa mushilo wine, lesa mu mulu,
Wa mushilo wine, wa luse na maka,

title: Indimi shingi ndefwaya
author: unknown
tunename: o for a thousand tongues to sing

title: Sumbuleni imitwe mwe
author: unknown
tunename: lift up your heads, ye gates

title: Tulumbanisha maka ye
author: unknown
tunename: all hail the power of jesu's name

title: Lumbanyeni yesu uwatuubula
author: unknown
verses: Celeleni yesu, mwe bali mu mulu,
Mwimbileni no lwimbo pe na pe.
Mwimbileni ni lwimbo pe na pe.
Mwimbileni no lwimbo pe na pe.

title: Natotlwe lesa, wa maka yonse
author: unknown
verses: Isa kuli lesa mu mwana wakwe,
Na ifwe twalyanga mu mwana wakwe;

title: Ne sese ne penga 'bengi baliko
subtitle: with harps and with viols
verses: Na mu cinso ca mfumu baimbo lwimbo:
Twali fye mu mfifi, twali abasha,

title: Pa busuma bwa calo
subtitle: for the beauty of the earth

title: Tata wesu tuli pa ntanshi penu
author: unknown
verses: Tata wesu tuli pa ntanshi penu;
Na 'ya menso yabe ya imwe bene
Ne milomo yesu ibe ya kristu,
Ilande pe luse lwakwe ku bantu.
Na 'ya matwi yabe yenu nshiku pe,
Tube fwe benu, mubili no m'tima.

title: Lesa wandi, lesa wandi, mpususheni ine
author: unknown
verses: Lesa wandi, lesa wandi, mpususheni ine,
Lesa wandi, lesa wandi, mpususheni ine,
Mwi shina lya kwa yesu kristu,
Wa kutemwa, wa cukuku, mpususheni ine.
Lesa wandi, lesa wandi, njeleleni ine,
Lesa wandi, lesa wandi, njeleleni ine,
Mwi shina lya kwa yesu kristu,
M'lopa wakwe unsambishe ku kubifye kwandi.
Lesa wandi, lesa wandi, pokeleni ine,
Lesa wandi, lesa wandi, pokeleni ine,
Mwi shina lya kwa yesu kristu,
Mfumu yandi, mwine luse, pokeleni ine.
Lesa wandi, lesa wandi, bakisheni ine,
Lesa wandi, lesa wandi, bakisheni ine
Mwi shina lya kwa yesu kristu,
Mbakisheni ku fya bubi, mbakisheni ine.

title: Lesa ekacema wandi
author: unknown
verses: Na mu ng'anda ya kwa lesa,

title: Mfumu ya luse kacema
author: unknown
verses: No ko ndi e ko aba.
Ku menshi ya mweo na ko

title: Imfumu yesu kristu
subtitle: ukufyalwa kwakwe (o come all ye faithful)
author: unknown

title: Bakakumba bapempwile
subtitle: while shepherds watched their flocks by night
author: unknown

title: Lyaishile ubushiku
subtitle: it came upon the midnight clear
author: unknown

title: Ni mu mushi wa kwa dabidi
subtitle: once in royal david's city
author: cecil frances alexander
verses: Ni mu mushi wa kwa dabidi

title: Akamushi betleheme
subtitle: o little town of bethlehem
author: phillips brooks
verses: Mwe ntanda shonse sha mu mulu

title: Kuli ifwe afyalilwa
subtitle: to us a child of hope

title: Ifyo bantu ba kale
subtitle: as with gladness men of old

title: Mwasho bufumu
subtitle: thou didst leave thy throne
verses: E mo mube pe mu mwenu.
E mo mube pe mu mwenu.
E mo mube pe mu mwenu.

title: Lesa wesu atemenwe calo
verses: Uyu yesu, uyu yesu ni mfumu
Ya ku mulu, ya ku mulu na panshi

title: Shina lya yesu busuma
subtitle: how sweet the name of jesus sounds

title: Yesu e kaafwa wesu
subtitle: what a friend we have in jesus

title: Ishiwi lya mfumu lileti
verses: We fumye cili mu linso lyobe

title: We lunkubwa lwa fyuma
verses: We lunkumbwa lwa fyuma (nobe) watwala bengi mu fibi
Imicitile yabo (yonse) yapalana fye ne ciwa.
Fwe balumendo na bakashana natucenjele ne fyuma,
Tupose fyonse tuli nafyo, lunkumbwa no bukowesho
Nga tukabe fubusa fyakwe, tukapwano mweo.
Lunkumbwa no bupupu (bwabo) e fyabatwele ku mfwa.
Ulu lwimbo twaimba (lelo) lukaba ni nte yesu,
Mwe baleibe fyuma fya bene mukapingulwa nafyo.
chorus: anika no bweye alimpo a kanamucilo.

title: Yesu atutemwa bonse
subtitle: one there is above all others

title: Kuli kapili ‘kutali
subtitle: there is a green hill far away

title: Pa kulolesha lupanda
subtitle: when i survey the wondrous cross
verses: Lwakulo luse e pamo ne palo

title: Owe, owe mwe bantu umfweni shiwi
verses: Owe, owe mwe bantu umfweni shiwi
Elya soswe lelo lyafika mu mitima
Owe, owe kanshi ni pali ine
Pa bubi ubo ncita, ubo ncita.
Ndelila pa nkasa sha kwa yesu,
Andubwile ne mubi, ndi mubi cine
Uyu mulandu wakwa yesu wakwa uwacita,
No luse no kutemwa pali ifwe
We katula, mulubushi, naisa kuli iwe,

title: Tuletasho watufwila
subtitle: we sing the praise of him who died

title: Balongana ‘babufi bapangana ‘kumutanika
verses: Imfwa ilya yali yesu, ukuti tube no mweo.
Pa capindama aibulilile emfwa ya bantu nse;
Ca cine kwali kushipa kwakwe kwalengele atufwile.
Muli wene icebo ca kutemwa casokoloka;
Tuli nankwe nomba, e katula uwatulwilile.
Bushe katula wa musango uyu tamulabe mwa?
Cine tutemwe yesu, ifwe pana tulemutemwa.

title: Palya pa lupanda mwe yesu amfwile
subtitle: para pa campinjika
verses: Palya pa lupanda mwe yesu amfwile
Pa mutwe pali ngala, ngala ya myunga
Ku ninga e ku ninga yesu abuka
Sekeleni bonse mwe yesu wa bumi.
Pa kunina ku mulu yesu atile,
Soseni ku fubusa na ku ba lupwa

title: Kristu nashukuke lelo
subtitle: jesus christ is risen today
verses: Mwe ba panshi na ba m’muli,

title: Mu nshishi alele
subtitle: low in the grave he lay

title: Yesu wene akateka
subtitle: jesus shall reign where'er the sun

title: Yesu pe fye mwabapo
subtitle: o, jesus ever present
verses: Apwe penga lya kwa lesa likomfwikwa mu cala,
Apo bukaca bwa lubuto tu tu,
Apo abasalwa bakaya longana pe shilya
Ubushiku bwa kutinya apwa bafwa bakema,
No kumono bukankala bwa kwa kristu;
Apo abasalwa bakaya longana kwa lesa,
Tuye landa ku bantu ifya mweo,
Nge milimo yapwa, ne few twaya mu calo cilia,

title: Uwafwikilwe imyunga
subtitle: the head that once was crowned with thorns

title: Mwise, mupashi bulesa
subtitle: 'spirit divine, attend our prayers
verses: Mube ne fwe mu ngande yi,

title: Mwi shina lya kwa yesu
verses: Mwi shina lya kwa yesu, mwe tata,
Ku luse lwenu mupe fya bupe;
Tuli fye no bulanda, mwe tata,
Mu luse lwenu lwine lwa ntaka,

title: Mwe lesa wandi, mube na ine
verses: Mwe lesa wandi, mube na ine;
Wa kwafwa ni mwe, mube na ine.
'fwa panshi fiya nge fya mu tulo;
Mwali no luse kale kuli ne;
Na ku ntashi fi mube na ine,
Mwaba na ine te kuti ntine,
Ne mfwa na maka ya bubi bwine
Ku mfwa, ku mweo, mube na ine.

title: Bwa lelo bwapwa, mwe kabumba
verses: Ilyo ku calo na ku bemba,
Ku sha nko shone ne ndupwa.

title: Bwa lelo bwapwa, mwe kabumba
verses: Ilyo ku calo na ku bemba,
Ku sha nko shone ne ndupwa.

title: Mutufumye no bupalo
author: unknown
tunename: lord, dismiss us with thy blessing

title: Lesa wandi natotela
author: unknown
tunename: glory to thee my god this night

title: Mwe mfumu twaleta bana
author: unknown
tunename: our children, lord, in faith and prayer

title: Katula aisa kana
author: unknown
tunename: a little child the saviour came

title: Buleni uwikashi
author: unknown
tunename: take my life and let it be

title: Mwe tata mubasuminishe bemwine pa ntanshi yenu
author: unknown
verses: Mwe tata mubasuminishe beminine pa ntanshi yenu,
Sumineni bapokeleleni, sumineni babe benu mu cine.
Mwe yesu aba bantu benu, mwafwile pa kubalubula
Benu lelo, umfweni baleti twabika imwe mu mitima yesu.
Na imwe mupashi washila, 'seni nomba mwikale nabo,
Bafweni ukwenda bwino, umutende wisule mu mitima yabo,
Bacite milimo isuma, bapeleni bonse amaka,
'kuti bende mubulungami basuke bafike kuli 'mwe ku mulu,
Mwe tata mutashiwe, na imwe yesu, mulubushi wesu,
Na imwe mupashi mu basangulule lesa umo fye acindikwe.

title: Ni kuno twamonana, mwe mfumu
author: unknown
tunename: here, o my lord, i see thee face to face
verses: Kanwe na imwe waini wa mulu;
E nshita ya kulyo no kulumba;
Ne mwe, mu nshite yi yawamisha
Shintu tukaba na sho kwa yesu.

title: Ni katula, pa mfwa yakwe
author: unknown
verses: Ni katula, pa mfwa yakwe, abulile umukate ati,
Mwe buleni, mwe buleni umukate, umukate, mulye
E mulopa, e mulopa wasumine, wasumine imwe.
Imfwa yandi, imfwa yandi, ndemufwila, ndemufwila, bonse

title: Yesu ni ntulo ya nsansa
author: unknown
verses: Mwe lesa mube ne fwe pe,

title: Apo ndeilingulula 'ndi mubembu
author: unknown
verses: Ine na maka yandi yeka yeka ndefilwa,
Pa kutuma yesu abe cilubula candi.
Ingu mfwe ukutemwa kwena cine ndepola,
Pantu wen ni mpalume ya bantu nse bonse
Nomba fwe bonse ilyo tucili pano;
Twibukishe mfwa yakwe no kubushiwa kwa kwe,
Ukunina kwa kwe, mpaka akasuke esa.
Kasuba ka kwe wenw na bangeli,
Pantu ako kasuba ka kwe ka kupingula.

title: Mwe luse lutuntulu no lwa bupe
author: unknown
verses: Mwe luse lutuntulu no lwa bupe,
Ku mweo, ku mfwa kwine, bafwane.

title: Cintu cakutusungusha
author: unknown
tunename: it is a thing most wonderful

title: Sekeleleni! kalubula 'isa
author: unknown
tunename: rejoice and be glad! the redeemer has come

title: Mwe umfweni imbia nsuma
author: unknown
verses: Ni kwi aya? ni ku mulu!

title: Bonse natulumbe lesu wesu
author: unknown
tunename: saviour, like a shepherd lead us

title: Mwe katula mwincilila
author: unknown
tunename: pass me not, o gentle saviour

title: Nombo kwishiba naishiba
author: unknown
verses: Amfumya mu mfifi, na ku mfwa;

title: Onse utemenwe! bomfwe bonse
author: unknown
verses: Bileni monse mu mpili ne nika;
Ne nshila ya mweo yene yabako:

title: Mwise kwa yesu, mwikokola
author: unknown
tunename: come to the saviour, make no delay

title: Kulyu bwite bulefuma kwi shilya
author: unknown
verses: Icikuku ca kwa yesu cice pe

title: Tande nshiku shonse mbuto sha busuma
author: unknown
tunename: sowing in the morning, sowing seeds of kindness
verses: Tande nshiku shonse mbuto sha busuma,
Tanda ku lucelo, na po kawa fwe;
Nga twaya tukasamwa pe, tukasamwa pe.
Tanda ku kasuba na ku cintelelwe,
Kanshi fwe balila, kanshi fwe banaka,

title: Na limbi 'iyo we mutima wandi
author: unknown
verses: Na limbi iyo we mutima wandi,

title: Katula umo wine
author: unknown
tunename: one offer of salvation to all the world

title: Bwela we waluba, we wanaka
author: unknown
verses: Akupelyo umweo wa pe na pe.

title: Ilintu mutende uleya na ine
verses: Satana nga ntunka, ngo kwisa kweshiwa,
Te kuti ntine; mu mfwa nga mu mweo,
E kwisa kwenu ndepembela, mwe mfumu,

title: Ndi wenu mfumu, nalyumfwa shiwi
verses: Na ine nsoshanya ne mwe lesa,

title: Yesu namutemwa shikulu wandi
verses: Katula wa luse, nkamwimbila fye pe,
E imwe mwalinga, e imwe mwalinga,
E imwe mwalinga, e imwe mwalinga,
No kwimba ningemba ne mfwa pa mpumi,
Na benu banino kuba nr mwe pe,
E imwe mwalinga, e imwe mwalinga,

title: Pepeni lesa mu mushilo wayemba
verses: Aleafwa no kubaka ku sha nkali,

title: Mwe cenge ca luse, ntungulushi
verses: Mwe lesa, ye! labeni sha kale.

title: Mwise njafwa, lesa m'kulu
verses: Pa kufika ku m'longa wa mfwa,

title: We mulendo uleys kwi?
verses: Ni few bantu bene yesu! lindilila!

title: Mu bulanda bonse ubo usanga
subtitle: “when upon life’s billows”
verses: Pende fya bupe bwa kwa lesa
Losha menso kuli kristu ku ntashi
Ne fya ku mwabo uleo atangila

title: Mwe mfumu nyende na imwe
subtitle: “o master, let me walk with thee”

title: Mwe mfumu nyende na imwe
subtitle: “o master, let me walk with thee”

title: Ku minwe lesa njikata
subtitle: “he leadeth me, o blessed thought”
verses: Mwe tata, nyende pe ne mwe,

title: Yesu aletwita bonse
subtitle: yesus calls us o’er the tumult

title: Esha pe, ushile, umfwe ku mfumu
subtitle: take time to be holy.
verses: Esha pe, ushile, umfwe ku mfumu;
Fwaye palo lyakwe, ne cebo baka.
Wende nankwe pamo, wiya pa natanshi:
E was ale nshila, e mweo wesu.
Enda no mupashi, poke fya bupe,
E fyo uwaminwe, ku mweo w ape.

title: Te kuti nkane yesu yo
subtitle: “i’m not ashamed to own my lord”
verses: Pa muti, pa muti yashibulwa menso,

title: Tulima no kutanda
subtitle: we plough the fields and scatter

title: Yemwe, tuyemfya bane
verses: Tulesefyo bwinga bwa mwana wa mpanga
E shibwings wesu mwana wa kwa lesa,
Ilambo lya cine e mitima yesu,
E kutemwe kwesu kuli tata wesu,
Twaipela kuli mwe tuli bantu benu.
Pa fifwalo fyesu, na pa filyo fyonse.
Na pa busuma bwa maluba yonse,
E ni mfuma yesu, akateke calo,
Mwe fibumbwa fyonse fya mu calo conse.

title: Yesu uwali mu mulu
verses: Ku mulu ni ku kwisa fwa;

title: Mwe shifwe wa mu mulu
verses: Ukufwaya kwenu kucitwe panonse nga mu mulu
Mutulekele imisha yesu, ifyp na ifwe tulekela abatulile misha.
(mutwelele milandu yesu, ngefyo na ifwe twelala abatubale imilandu).
Mwitutwala mukweshowa, lelo mututule ku bubi.
Pantu ubufumu, na maka, no kucindama fyenu' umuyayaya. amen,

title: Isubilo lya bapostoli
verses: Nasubila muli lesa, shifwe wa maka yonse
Na mulu yesu kristu, umwana wakwe eka.
Uyo walengelwe no mupashi wa mushilo;
Ubushiku bwalenga shitatu abushiwa ku bafwa;
Aikala ku kuboko kwa kulyo kwa kwa lesa,
Ukufuma uko akesa pingula abomi na bafwa;
Nasubila mu mupashi wa mushila, na mu
Lukuka lwa mushilo ulwa bonse bene;

title: Isubilo (lya cilye ca nikesa a. d. 325)
verses: Nasubila muli lesa umo, shifwe wa maka yonse,
Ne fintu fyonse fyamoneka ne fishamoneka:
Na mu mfumu imo yesu kristu, mwana wafyalwa eka wa kwa lesa.
Wafyalwa na wishi pa ntanshi ya nshita shonse,
Lesa wine wine wa kuli lesa wine wine,
Wa musango umo wine na lesa shifwe;
Muli uyo wine ifintu fyonse fyabumbilwe,
Uyo pali ifwe bantu, na pa bupususho bwesu, aikile ukufuma ku mulu,
No kufyalwa muli mariya umushimbe na mupashi wa mushilo,
No kutanikwa pali ifwe kuli pontio pilato.
No kwikala ku kuboko kwa kulyo kwa kwa lesa shifwe.
Uko akesa kabinga no lulumbi ukupingula abomi na bafwa:
Kabili nasubila muli mupashi wa mushilo’
Uyo watula kuli lesa shifwe no mwana,
Uyo atotelwa no kulumbwa pamo na lesa shifwe no mwana,
Uyo asosele no tunwa twa bakasesema.
Lya mushilo, lya bonse bene, lya bapostolo bene,
Nasubila mu lubatisho lumo fye lwa kufulunganya kwa mpulumushi,
Kabili no kulolela ukututubuka kwa bafwa,
No mweo wa cala ico cikesa.

title: Amashiwi ye shuko (mateo 5: 3-10)
verses: Balishuka ababusu mu mitima; pantu ubufumu bwa mu mulu bwabo.
Balishuka abali ne nsala ne cilaka ca bulungami; pantu bene bakekuta.
Balishuka aba luse; pantu bakabelelwo luse.
Balishuka abasanguluke mitima; pantu baka mona lesa.
Balishuka abacito mutende; pantu baketwa abana ba kwa lesa.
Balishuka abalamatilwa pa mulandu wa bulungami; pantu ubufuma bwa mu mulu bwabo.

Muli abashuka ilyo bamupontela, no kumulamata, no kumwambo bufi icintu conse ca bubifi pa mulandu wa ine; sekeleleni no kwanga, pantu icilambu cenu cikalamba mu mulu; pantu e fyo balamete bakasesema ba ntanshi.
R lembeni fye shuko, mu mitima, mfumu.
subtitle: mateo 5: 3-10

title: Lesa akupale (impendwa 6: 24-26)
verses: Yehoba alenge icinso cakwe ukubutisha kuli iwe, no kukusenamina;
yehoba enwine icinso cakwe kuli iwe, no kukupo mutende

title: lesa akupale (impendwa 6: 24-26)
verses: Nomba, we mwine lubanda, muleke umusha wenu aye, aye umutende umwabele shiwi lyenu;
Pa kuti amenso yandi yamone pusukilo lyenu.
ilyo mwapekanisha kuccinso ca bantu na ‘bantu.

Ku kubo lubuto lwa kusokolwela abena fyalo. no bukata bwa bantu benu abena israele. ululumbi lube kuli lesa shifwe, na ku mwana, n ku mupashi wa mushilo: ifintu lwali mu butendeko; efyo lwaba nomba, efyo lwakulaba pe na pe. amen.

title: Ululumbi
subtitle: gloria in excelsis
verses: Ululumbi lube ku mulu kuli lesa, no mu tende mu calo, ubusuma ku bantu.
Twamuletela ululumbi pa mulandu wa lulumbi lwenu lukalamba,
Mwe mfumu lesa, kateka wa ku mulu, lesa shifwe wa maka yonse.
Mwe mfumu, mwana wafyalwa eka yesu kristu;
Mwe mfumu lesa, mwana wa mpanga wa kwa lesa, wa kwa lesa shifwe,
Mwe bafumya imembu shs calo, mutubelel uluse
Mwe bafumya imembu shs calo, mutubelele uluse.
Mwe bafumya imembu shs calo, mupokele ipepo lyesu.
Mwe baikala ku kuboku kwa kulyo kwa kwa lesa shifwe mutubelele uluse.
Pantu imwe mweka fye muli mushilo; imwe mweka fye muli mfumu. imwe mweka, mwe kristu, pamo no mupashi wa mushilo, muli wa pa mulu mu lulumbi lwa kwa lesa shifwe. amen

title: Ulwimbo lwa kwa maria
subtitle: (luka 1: 46-55)
verses: No mweo wandi waangile lesa katula wandi;
Pantu alolesha pa bulanda bwa musha wakwe. pantu, moneni, ukufuma kuli nomba aba nkulo shonse bakanumbulo washuka
Pantu uwa maka ancitila fikalamba. kabili lya mushilo ishina lyakwe.
No luse lwakwe lwa ku nkuli ne nkulo ku bamutina.
Acita ca maka ku kuboku kwakwe. asalanganya aba miya mu kwelenganya kwa mitima yabo,
Abakata abesha pa fupuna fya bufumu, na ‘balanda abasansabika,
Aba nsala abekusha fisuma, na ‘ba fyuma abafumyako iminwe mikutwa.
Ayatwa kalume wakwe isreale, ukwibukisho kubelelo luse,
(ifyo asosele ku fikolwe fyesu) kuli abrahamu no bufyashi bwakwe, umuyayaya.
Ululumbi lube kuli lesa shifwe, na ku mwana, na ku mupashi wa mushilo.
Ifintu lwali mu butendeko: efyo lwaba na nomba, efyo lwakulaba pe na pe. amen.

title: Ulwibo lwa kwa zakaria
subtitle: (luka 1: 68-79)
verses: Abe uwapalwa lesa wa kwa israele, pa kuti napempula abantu bakwe, no kuba citile cilubula;
Kabili atwimikilo lusengo lwe pisikilo, mu ng’anda ya mubomfi wakwe dabidi-

Ifyo alandile kale umuyayaya mu tunwa twa ba mushilo, bakasesema bakwe; ku kututula ku balwani besu, na ku maboko ya bonse abatupata; ku kucito luse ku fikolwe fyesu, no kwibukishe layano lwakwe lwa lya mushilo,
Umulopa uo alapila kuli abrahamu icikolwe cesu,
Ukuti, pa kuba abapokololwa ku maboko ya balwani besu.
Atupele ukuba aba kumupyungila ukabulo mwenso,
Mu mushilo na mu bulungami ku menso yakwe inshiku shesu shonse.
Awe na iwe, we mwana, uketwa kasesema wa wapulamo; pantu ukatangilila ku cinso ka kwe shikulu ku kupekanye nshila shakwe.
Ku kulanga bantu bakwe ukwishibe pusukilo mu kulekelelwe membu shabo,
Pa mulandu wa luse lwa cikuku ulwa kwa lesa wesu, umukesa tupempwilo kuca kwa mu mulu uwapulamo,
Ku kubalikila pa baikala mu mfifi na mu cinshingwa ca mfwa,
Ululumbi lube kuli lesa shifwe, na ku mwana, na ku mupashi wa mushilo. ifintu lwali mu butendeko; efyo lwaba na nomba, efyo lwakulaba pen a pe. amen.

title: Twamulumbanya imwe mwe lesa
verses: Twamulumbanya imwe, mwe lesa: twasumina ukuti imwe muli mfumu.
Icalo conse cilemutotela: mwe shifwe wa pe na pe.
Bamutotela na bangeli bonse: ne myulu na ba make bonse abaikalamo.
Kuti imwe bacelubi na baselafi: bemba no kuleka iyo.
Mwe mushilo, mwe mushilo, mwe mushilo: mfumu lesa wa mabumbwa.
Umulu ne calo: fyaisula no lulumbi lwenu.
Bapostolo mu cilonganino caba ca kutasha: bamulumbanya imwe.
Bakasesema mu kwafwana kwabo kwawamisha: bamulumbanya imwe.
Bamufwilile mu mabumba yabo ayacindama: bamulumbanya imwe.
Eklesia lya mushilo mu fyalo fyonse: iyasuminisha imwe.
Mwe lesa shifwe: mwe ba lulumbi lushakapwe.
No mwana wenu wacindikwa wa cine uwafyelwe eka.
Imwe muli mfumu ya lulumbi mwe kristu.
Muleikalilila pe umwana wa kwa lesa shifwe.
Ilintu mwaiminine kupususha abantu: tamwasulile fumo lya mushimbe.
Ilintu mwapwile ukwansho kucula kwa mfwa, mwabeswila bonse abasubila bufumu bwa ku mulu.
Mwaikala ku kuboko kwa kulwo kwa kwa lesa: mu lulumbu lwa kwa shifwe.
Twasubila ukuti mukesa kabili ku kutupingula.
Eco twapapata mubafwa abatu benu: abo mwalubula no mulopa wabulo mutengo.
Mubapende mu mulongo wa basalwa benu: mu lulumbi lya pen a pe.
Mwe mfumu, mubapusushe abantu benu: no kupala ba bupyani bwenu.
Kabinga twatotela ishina lyenu mu nshita shonse pen a pe.
Twamupapata, mwe mfumu: mutucinge lelo line ku mpulumushi.
Mwe mfumu, mutubelele uluse, mutubelele uluse.
Mwe mfumu, mutulangilile uluse lwenu, ngefyo twacetekela muli imwe.
Mwe mfumu, muli imwe nincetekela, mwindeka nsebane iyo.

title: Fwe balendo twafuma konse konse
verses: Ni ku maca e kumwesu fwe bantu
Mpepo yeka calo ca ku mwesu twakabila

title: Kuli lesa tuleto
subtitle: praise god from whom all blessings flow
